title: Im sick and tired of miss fortune support
body: This back up ADC lethality cancer needs to go

replies.body:
Does MF Support even build Lethality?

I'm pretty sure her standard "core" build is:
{{item:3158}} {{item:2301}} {{item:3071}} {{item:3033}}

If she is building Lethality, it isn't going to be before her fourth item.

If the enemy team goes a poke comp and no tank, she can flex her build abit and have some lethality, from watching a few streams and my own experience, did tons of damage.  I wouldn't call it broken though, just good
